#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <limits.h>

using namespace std;

int Convert( int n, int b ) {
	
	int sum = 0, i = 0;

	while( n > 0 ) {

		sum += ( pow( b, i ) * ( n % 10 ) );
		i++; 
		n /= 10;
	}

	return sum;
}

int FindBase( int a ) {
	
	int b = -1, r;

	while( a > 0 ) {

		r = a % 10;
		b = max( b, r );
		a /= 10;
	}

	return ( b + 1 );
}

int main() {
	
	int t, a, b, v1, v2, v3, max1, max2, minVal, i, j;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {
	
		scanf("%d %d", &a, &b );

		max1 = FindBase( a );
		max2 = FindBase( b );
		minVal = INT_MAX;
		//cout << max1 << " : " << max2 << endl;
		for( i = max1;i <= 10;i++ )
			for( j = max2;j <= 10;j++ ) {

				v1 = Convert( a, i );
				v2 = Convert( b, j );
				v3 = v1 + v2;
				minVal = min( minVal, v3 );
			}

		printf("%d\n", minVal);	
	}
	return 0;
}
